short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your browser network traffic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WittCepter is a network analysis tool that captures and modifies browser traffic. It is essentially Postman with easier request building and request/response header modification.

-------Features-------
- Capture HTTP requests and responses
- Modify and resend request bodies, headers, and URLs.
- Add, modify, and remove request and response HTTP headers
- Create custom HTTP headers
- Bypass CORS
- Filter the requests captured using HTTP methods, status codes, and URLs.
- Easily debug network requests for the current tab by displaying all the requests and responses in a side panel.
----------------------
v.1.12.1
- Fix issue with no vertical scroll on the Stripe page.

v1.12.0
- Get extension information from an API as opposed to hard coding.

v1.11.0
- Use new API to handle authentication.

v1.10.0
- Add authentication to the tab HTTP request capture content script
- Make the tab HTTP request capture on by default after initial sign in

v1.9.0
- Add OAuth 2.0 Google login
